actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for a waiver of the 5-month waiting period for disability insurance benefits for certain terminally ill individuals.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to substitute a shorter waiting period for disability insurance benefits in the case of a disabled terminally ill applicant.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for a waiver of the 5-month waiting period for disability insurance benefits for certain terminally ill individuals.
